'Instructions: 
Use the Context provided as follows:
1. Options:
	The correct answer is always included in given list. 
	Use the options to filter out irrelevant details provided in the context.

2. Genes and Variants:
	Only focus on the information about the genes and variants.
	Please ignore the other information.
Context: 
Disease oral cavity cancer associates Gene HLA-DQB1. Disease oral cavity cancer associates Gene ADH1B. Variant rs6547741 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Variant rs10462706 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Variant rs1049055 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Disease oral cavity cancer associates Gene GPN1.. Variant rs121909224 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Variant rs121913281 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Disease autoimmune hepatitis associates Gene HLA-DQA1. Disease autoimmune hepatitis associates Gene HLA-DQB1. Disease autoimmune hepatitis associates Gene TSBP1. Gene MIR122 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs6932730 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs56036302 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs72929257 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs2187668 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs1794514 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant DQA1*05:01 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Variant rs6809477 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. Gene MIR21 associates Disease autoimmune hepatitis. 
Question: 
Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with oral cavity cancer and autoimmune hepatitis. Given list is:  KAT2B, TTLL5, HLA-DQB1,  HOXD3,  SAMM50'
